articles.title: S. Korean Military Authorities' Rejection of Contact Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Authorities' Rejection of Contact Denounced
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the north side's delegation to the north-south military talks issued the following statement Friday denouncing the south side for rejecting the north-south military working talks:
					 Recently the south Korean puppet military has persisted in the operation for scattering anti-DPRK leaflets in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line where the armed forces of both sides stand in acute confrontation and perpetrated such military provocations as infiltrating ships of its navy into the territorial waters of the DPRK side in the West Sea of Korea one after another.
					
					 The puppet minister of Defense openly called for modulating frequency of anti-DPRK psychological broadcasting and distributing radios needed for it in the areas of the DPRK side and even cried out for installing more loud-speakers and setting up new large electronic displays. All this adds to the gravity of the situation.
					
					 In order to put the grave prevailing situation under control, the DPRK side on Oct. 22 proposed the south side holding the north-south military working talks to discuss the issue of implementing military agreements already reached between the militaries of both sides.
					
					 The south side, however, turned down the proposal for the talks, talking about "a responsible measure" for the case of sunken warship "Cheonan" and the "ambiguity" of the issue of implementing the north-south military agreements as regards the proposed talks.
					
					 When looking back on the history of the north-south relations, it is very hard to find a precedent in which one party rejected the talks proposed by the other party even when the bilateral relations reached the lowest ebb. This was because the rejection of dialogue precisely meant confrontation and war.
					
					 The action taken by the puppet military authorities to reject dialogue and contact is an expression of their ignorance of the trend of the times and an act of treachery turning their back on the nation by stoking mistrust and confrontation.
					
					 As for the sunken warship case, it was obviously a hideous fabrication and charade orchestrated against the DPRK and, therefore, the puppet forces are obliged to apologize to the DPRK for this a thousand times.
					
					 The army of the DPRK will counter the south side's reckless provocative act of openly shunning the implementation of the inviolable bilateral agreement with a merciless physical retaliation. 
					
					 The DPRK considers the improvement of the north-south relations and detente as dear, but it will no longer feel any interest in dialogue and contact as long as the puppet forces keep doing harm to the DPRK under the pretext of the sunken "Cheonan" case.
					
					 The north-south relations will move in the direction set by the DPRK as required by the times and the desire of the nation even without military dialogue and contact.
					
					 The south Korean puppet military authorities will have to keenly realize what catastrophic impact their rejection of dialogue will have on the north-south relations.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Indonesian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Indonesian President
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of sympathy to Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, Indonesian president, as regards the earthquake and tsunami that hit areas around Sumatra Island of Indonesia, claiming huge casualties and material losses.
					 Expressing deep sympathy and consolation to the president, and through him, to the victims and bereaved families, Kim in the message expressed conviction that the president and government of Indonesia would eradicate the aftermath of the disaster and bring the living of the people in the afflicted areas to normal as early as possible.

articles.title: New Postage Stamps Published
articles.content:
New Postage Stamps Published
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has issued an individual stamp and a sheetlet to commemorate the unofficial visit to the People's Republic of China paid by General Secretary Kim Jong Il from last August 26 to 30.
					 Seen in the upper parts of the stamps are such inscriptions as "Commemoration of the unofficial visit of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il to the People's Republic of China" and "August 26-August 30, Juche 99 (2010)".
					
					 The individual stamp carries a picture of Kim Jong Il meeting with President Hu Jintao.
					
					 Printed in the sheetlet are a picture of Kim Jong Il leaving his autograph after visiting Jilin Yuwen Middle School where President Kim Il Sung studied from 1927 to 1929, and pictures of the DPRK leader visiting various places of northeastern China.

articles.title: Another UHP Electric Arc Furnace Starts Operation
articles.content:
Another UHP Electric Arc Furnace Starts Operation 
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- UHP Electric Arc Furnace No.2 went into operation at the Chollima Steel Complex.
					 Workers in Kangson built another UHP electric arc furnace, completed the construction of multi-element alloy steel production base and the reconstruction project of rotary kiln No. 3 of the Posan Iron Works and set up 550 cubic meter oxygen separator. 
					
					 The successful modernization of the complex laid a firm foundation for drastically increasing the production of different kinds of iron and steel materials urgently needed for building an economic power, making contribution to further consolidating the independence of steel industry. 
					
					 A commissioning ceremony took place on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Yong Rim, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Hong Sok Hyong, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Thae Nam, vice premier of the Cabinet, Kim Thae Bong, minister of Metal Industry, and others. 
					
					 At the ceremony Choe Yong Rim conveyed a message of congratulation of the WPK Central Committee to workers, technicians, officials and helpers who performed brilliant feats in the project for modernizing the complex. 
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 After the ceremony the participants went round different projects including the newly built UHP electric arc furnace.

articles.title: Delicacy Restaurant under Okryu Restaurant Completed
articles.content:
Delicacy Restaurant under Okryu Restaurant Completed
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A modern delicacy restaurant under Okryu Restaurant was completed. 
					 The restaurant, which has a total floor space of more than 6,000 square meters and is capable of accommodating thousands of visitors, is a catering centre for providing best service to people.
					
					 With the appearance of the elegant, magnificent and exquisite restaurant, a good combination of national, classical and contemporary architectural styles, the area of Okryu Restaurant has turned into a street of catering facilities built in a peculiar Korean architectural style to be proud of. 
					
					 A ceremony for the completion of the restaurant took place on Friday.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Jon Ha Chol, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Ryang Man Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, officials concerned, soldier-builders, officials and employees of the restaurant.
					
					 Ko Pyong Sop, general director of the General Bureau for Service for People, made a speech on the occasion.

articles.title: Scientific Research Activities Brisk among Students
articles.content:
Scientific Research Activities Brisk among Students
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Students of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, in hearty response to the call of the Workers' Party of Korea for acquiring ultra-modern science and technologies, have contributed to updating major economic sectors through activities of scientific research groups.
					 Students of Kim Il Sung University, dispatched to the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory associated with undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk, have invented new measuring instruments necessary for the production of starch syrup and dextrose and put the analysis process on the CNC basis.
					
					 Other students of the same university have applied their research findings to a co-op farm in Pyongyang to raise the weight of piglets by 31 percent.
					
					 Students of Kim Chaek University of Technology have helped the Chollima Steel Complex in basing the temperature control system of the drying furnace on the CNC technology, which is necessary for the full operation of UHP electric arc furnace.
					
					 Those of Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering have developed a monitoring system of the water electrolysis process newly built in the ammonia workshop of the February 8 Vinalon Complex in order to prevent  accident and improve the quality of hydrogen and oxygen.
					
					 Students of Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, Han Tok Su University of Light Industry and other universities and colleges throughout the country have also made a good job in solving scientific and technological problems to boost the production of industrial establishments.

articles.title: New Documentary Film Produced
articles.content:
New Documentary Film Produced
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Korean Documentary and Science Film Studio produced "By Letting the People's Army Take the Lead in the Economic Construction", Part 5 of the documentary film "The Sun of Songun Shedding Its Rays All over the World".
					 The film deals with the undying exploits performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il in making a breakthrough in the socialist economic construction by putting forward the KPA as the driving force for the revolution under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 The film tells stories that Kim Jong Il, while conducting ceaseless long journeys for Songun leadership, made sure that the spirit of charge and revolutionary enthusiasm prevailed in every worksite in the drive for the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation with the KPA as a pillar, core and model.
					
					 It has scenes showing Kim Jong Il leaving his giant footprints in the construction sites of the Huichon Power Station and mounting the dam of the Nyongwon Power Station in his tireless efforts to make servicepersons heroes of the era and creators of happiness of people with his warm love and trust. 
					
					 It also shows praiseworthy soldier-builders performing world-startling miracles and feats by displaying popular heroism and matchless spirit of charge in every worksite for effecting a great surge under the care of the illustrious commander of Songun.
					
					 The film proves that the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il serves as an engine for winning every victory.

articles.title: National Sports Festival Closes
articles.content:
National Sports Festival Closes
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The national sports festival that opened on October 15 in celebration of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea was closed with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Streets on Friday.
					 Players at the festival set new world record in the women's team event of shooting in trench and new DPRK records in the different events of shooting, archery, athletic and weight lifting.
					
					 Men and women players of the Mangyongbong Sports Team placed first at football games, men players of the Kigwancha Sports Team and women players of the Amnokgang Sports Team at basketball games and men and women players of the April 25 Sports Teams at volleyball games. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, officials concerned and sportspersons.
					
					 Pak Myong Chol, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, made a closing speech.

articles.title: Roast Chestnut, Sweet Potato Stalls Salient
articles.content:
Roast Chestnut, Sweet Potato Stalls Salient
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A lot of roast chestnut and sweet potato stalls have been installed in streets of Pyongyang, drawing many people, including children. 
					 Sin Kum Son, chief of the Sinwon Greengrocery in Pothonggang District, told KCNA they had kept in store several dozen tons of sweet potatoes and chestnuts this year to serve customers.
					
					 Many years ago, President Kim Il Sung provided a production and supply system of sweet potatoes and chestnuts for Pyongyang citizens to take roast chestnuts and sweet potatoes in autumn.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il took all necessary measures to fully supply Pyongyang with sweet potatoes and chestnuts every year. 
					
					  The supply system worked well even in the period when the country was in the "Arduous March", the forced march.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Moves to Participate in MD Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Moves to Participate in MD Slammed
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations and opposition parties in south Korea including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the Solidarity for Progress, the Preparatory Committee for Solidarity and Peace against War and the Democratic Labor Party at a press conference in front of the building of the puppet Ministry of Defense in Seoul on Oct. 25 lashed out at the warmongers for their reckless moves to participate in the missile defence system of the U.S.
					 Speakers at the press conference accused Minister of Defense Kim Thae Yong of officially clarifying the examination of the participation in the MD at the "National Assembly" on Oct. 22.
					
					 The MD is not a means for defence but for a preemptive nuclear attack upon the DPRK, they noted, adding that south Korea's involvement in it is a dangerous action as it increases the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula and obstructs the denuclearization of the peninsula and conclusion of a peace treaty.
					
					 Such sycophantic traitors as Lee Myung Bak who intends to allow the transfer of the U.S. forces Futenma base to south Korea and Kim Thae Yong who mulls examining its participation in the U.S. missile defence system should step down at once, the speakers demanded.
					
					 They declared that all the people of south Korea who desire the denuclearization of the peninsula, the conclusion of a peace treaty and the abrogation of the south Korea-U.S. alliance for war would wage dynamic actions to check the above-said moves of the authorities.

articles.title: Resignation of Chief of Police Agency Demanded
articles.content:
Resignation of Chief of Police Agency Demanded
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations grouping people of various strata of south Korea including the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty at a press conference in Seoul on October 25 demanded the resignation of the chief of the puppet Police Agency.
					 Recalling that those concerned of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration have been subject to ceaseless crackdown, they clarified that Jo Hyon O, the newly appointed chief of the police agency, was behind this suppression.
					
					 They accused Jo of playing the role of a running dog of the repressive regime despite the people's criticism and denunciation. 
					
					 They urged him to stop the reckless suppression and step down as early as possible.

articles.title: WPK's Exploits Praised in Nigeria
articles.content:
WPK's Exploits Praised in Nigeria
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar on the theme of "The Workers' Party of Korea and the Songun revolutionary leadership" was held in Abuja, Nigeria on October 19 to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					 Displayed in the venue of the seminar were works of Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing the WPK's ever-victorious history. 
					
					 M. M. Alhassan, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, in his keynote report titled "The Songun revolutionary guidance of great leader Kim Jong Il" made at the seminar referred to the fact that President Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea, the Songun idea in his early years and defeated two imperialisms, the U.S. and Japan, protecting the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation, and Kim Jong Il acquired the personality as a brilliant commander in the crucible of the great anti-Japanese war and the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 He recalled that thanks to the peerlessly brilliant commanders the Korean revolutionary armed forces grew to be invincible ones firmly prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique and the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a military power having a powerful war deterrent.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership provides a guarantee for the victory of socialist Korea, he noted, adding that the Korean people would smash the imperialists' moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and surely open the gate to a thriving socialist nation under his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The floor was taken by various figures. 
					
					 The speakers said that the desire for reunification is now growing stronger on the Korean Peninsula, adding that this reality proves the validity and vitality of the WPK's policy for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 They pointed out that witnessing the fierce stand-off between the DPRK and the U.S. on the peninsula, they came to grasp the might of the Songun politics. They praised it as the greatest one leading the Korean people to victory and glory.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Portavoz de la parte Norte advierte a las autoridades militares surcoreanas
articles.content:
Portavoz de la parte Norte advierte a las autoridades militares surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ATCC) -- Con motivo de que la parte surcoreana rehusa las conversaciones militares de trabajo entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea, el portavoz de la delegacion nortena a las conversaciones militares hizo publica el dia 29 la siguiente declaracion:
					　En estos tiempos, el circulo militar titere del Sur de Corea continua el lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en los alrededores de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar donde estan en agudo enfrentamiento las fuerzas armadas de ambas partes y comete la provocacion militar de mandar sus buques de guerra a las aguas jurisdiccionales de la parte Norte en el Mar Oeste de Corea. 
					
					　La situacion se torno mas grave cuando el mismo ministro titere de Defensa Nacional abogo por cambiar la frecuencia de la radioemision psicologica contra la RPDC y lanzar en la extension de esta las radios necesarias para oirla, destacando la necesidad de instalar adicionalmente los altavoces y las pantallas de gran tamano para la demagogia anti-RPDC. 
					
					　Para remediar esta situacion grave, la parte Norte propuso el 22 de octubre a la parte Sur sostener las conversaciones militares de trabajo con el fin de discutir el problema de ejecucion del acuerdo militar alcanzado ya por ambas partes.
					
					  Pero, la parte Sur rehuso esa propuesta hablando de las supuestas "medidas responsables" en cuanto al incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" y de la "intransparencia" de la implementacion del acuerdo militar Norte-Sur. 
					
					  Si recordamos la trayectoria de las relaciones intercoreanas, aunque estas se hallaban en el estado extremado, muy raras veces una parte se nego a la propuesta de la contraparte sobre el dialogo.
					
					  Es que la negativa al dialogo significa perseguir el enfrentamiento y la guerra.
					
					  La conducta de las autoridades del ejercito titere surcoreano, que niegan el dialogo y el contacto, es la expresion de su ignorancia de la corriente de la epoca y un acto traidor que perjudica a los connacionales con desconfianza y confrontacion.
					
					  A decir del caso del "Cheonan", esto fue evidentemente la farsa y complot de gran tamano contra la RPDC y por lo tanto, los titeres surcoreanos deben pedir mil disculpas a ella.
					
					  El Ejercito Popular de Corea frustrara tajantemente con implacable reaccion fisica los imprudentes actos provocativos de la parte Sur que elude abiertamente la ejecucion del sagrado acuerdo bilateral.
					
					  Si bien son valiosos el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas y el relajamiento de la tension, la RPDC tampoco estara interesada en el dialogo ni en el contacto puesto que los titeres siguen calumniandola pretextando el incidente del "Cheonan".
					
					  Aunque no hayan el dialogo y contacto militares, las relaciones intercoreanas correran con el rumbo, que les de la RPDC, conforme a la demanda de la epoca y la aspiracion nacional.
					
					  Las autoridades militares titeres del Sur de Corea sentiran en carne propia cuan catastroficas seran las consecuencias que se produciran en las relaciones intercoreanas por su negativa al dialogo.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete 
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ATCC) -- El embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Cuba en Corea, Jose Manuel Galego Montano, ofrecio el dia 28 en su sede diplomatica un banquete con motivo de la marcha exitosa de la Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la celebracion solemne del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de esta agrupacion politica. 
					　Fueron invitados el miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Yong Il, y otros funcionarios del CC del PTC.
					
					　Jose Manuel Galego Montano refirio en su discurso que la Conferencia del PTC reeligio al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del PTC y se celebro solemnemente el 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC. 
					
					　Subrayo que este ano, el companero Fidel Castro Ruz publico sus reflexiones denunciando las maniobras de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos tendentes a atropellar a la RPDC y manifestando la solidaridad con la lucha del pueblo coreano por la construccion socialista, la soberania y la reunificacion del pais. 
					
					　Deseo de todo corazon que el pueblo coreano abra las puertas a la gran potencia prospera y tenga una vida feliz y formulo votos por el desarrollo del PTC, en nombre del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Cuba. 
					
					　Kim Yong Il, a su vez, expreso profundo agradecimiento al Partido Comunista de Cuba y al pueblo cubano que envian total apoyo y solidaridad a la lucha del PTC y el pueblo coreano por construir una gran potencia prospera socialista y lograr la reunificacion independiente del pais, siguiendo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun. 
					
					　Dijo que el pueblo coreano se alegra mucho, como si fueran los propios, de los exitos logrados en Cuba bajo la direccion de los estimados camaradas Fidel Castro Ruz y Raul Castro Ruz. 
					
					　Expreso la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad entre los dos partidos y los dos pueblos establecidas y desarrolladas en la lucha antiimperialista y antiyanqui y por el socialismo se fortaleceran mas por los esfuerzos conjuntos.

articles.title: Firmado convenio de cooperacion economica y tecnica Corea-Brasil
articles.content:
Firmado convenio de cooperacion economica y tecnica Corea-Brasil
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ATCC) -- Quedo rubricado el dia 28 en esta capital el convenio sobre la cooperacion economica y tecnica entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica Federativa de Brasil.
					　En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el ministro de Comercio Exterior Ri Ryong Nam y otros funcionarios por la parte coreana, y por la brasilena, el embajador Arnaldo Carrilho y un miembro de la embajada brasilena en Corea.
					
					　Tambien participaron los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y otros miembros de embajadas acreditados en Corea y los huespedes brasilenos que permanecen en Corea.
					
					　Ri Ryong Nam y Arnaldo Carrilho suscribieron el documento.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de consuelo al presidente indonesio
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de consuelo al presidente indonesio
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 28 un mensaje de consuelo y condolencias al presidente de la Republica de Indonesia, Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, en relacion con que este pais sufrio muchas perdidas humanas y materiales por el terremoto y tsunamis ocurridos en alrededores de la isla Sumatra.
					　El remitente expresa profunda compasion y condolencias al destinatario y por su conducto, a los habitantes damnificados y los familiares de difuntos y manifiesta la conviccion de que el presidente y el gobierno de Indonesia resarciran cuanto antes las secuelas del desastre natural y estabilizaran la vida de los habitantes de la zona afectada.
